CM_AMP_MAP.REQ.description: "CM_AMP_MAP.REQ" is a request message used in the communication process to send a new amplitude map along with additional valid parameters. This message plays a crucial role in ensuring that the amplitude map and its associated parameters are accurately communicated within the system, facilitating effective and efficient data transmission.

connections.description: The CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message is part of the communication protocol specified by ISO:15118-3:2015:IS
The Test System sends the CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message
The GoodCase procedure involves sending a CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message
The CM_AMP_MAP.CNF message is sent in response to the CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message

CM_AMP_MAP.CNF.description: "CM_AMP_MAP.CNF" is a confirmation message sent by the System Under Test (SUT) with 'result' equals to '00'H. This message is sent in response to the CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message, indicating the result of the request.

connections.description: The CM_AMP_MAP.CNF message is part of the communication protocol specified by ISO:15118-3:2015:IS
The SUT sends the CM_AMP_MAP.CNF message
The CM_AMP_MAP.CNF message is sent in response to the CM_AMP_MAP.REQ message
